questions.text:

  4. Praziquantel can be given for 10 days.

questions.text:

  2. Larva currens is fast-moving transient rash seen across abdomen and buttocks

  4. Systematic strongyloidiasis is seen in immunocompetent state.

Which of the statements given above are correct?
questions.solution:
Ans: (a) 1 and 2
